lines.text: Just to make sure- you didn't shoot this guy, did you?
You didn't walk in, pop the wizard with your gun, and then bring me in to help cover it up?
'Cause I'd do it. Take a couple months off my parole, I'll throw my hat in with police corruption in a heartbeat!
Honest! Anything for you, boss. Keheheheh...
I didn't dang shoot nobody, Seeker. Get back to work.
